title: The Shutdown of “Luxury Emissions” Should Be at the Center of Climate Revolt
description:
Climate disorder won’t be remedied through an orderly march of green energy. The world must also rein in consumption.

The post The Shutdown of “Luxury Emissions” Should Be at the Center of Climate Revolt appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Inside the Fight for Climate Justice
description:
A new film takes viewers behind the scenes of the push for a Green New Deal.

The post Inside the Fight for Climate Justice appeared first on The Intercept.
